format: A data frame with 2253 observations on the following 2 variables.

parameters.party_or_ideology:
a factor with levels
Conservative Republican Liberal Democrat Mod/Cons
Democrat Mod/Lib Republican

description:
Description
A 2010 Pew Research poll asked 1,306 Americans, "From what you've read and
heard, is there solid evidence that the average temperature on earth has
been getting warmer over the past few decades, or not?"
title: Pew survey on global warming
reference:
Pew Research Center, Majority of Republicans No Longer See Evidence
of Global Warming, data collected on October 27, 2010.
